page.title: 19Tourism in Nether Kellet
page.content: There are two caravan sites near Nether Kellet. Intack Farm has only static caravans and there are no tourists allowed. Altogether there are 27 caravans. It is a residential site. The area of the site is three acres. There is a play area for the children and the farm sells milk and eggs. The caravan site was built in 1960. Their busiest times are during Bank Holidays. Some of the caravans belong to the site owners. Intack caravan site is to the east of Nether Kellet. Just off the main road to Over Kellet is Hawthorns caravan and camping site. They have 40 static caravans and 8 touring caravans which are long stay. There is a putting green, telephone, shop, swing, toilets, showers, games room and other facilities. Hawthorns was built in 1962. Its area is ten acres.
